items.title: Top candidates are avoiding the CEO role. Here’s how to make the gig worth taking
items.description: The chief executive role has lost its luster despite hefty compensation packages.

items.title: JPMorgan renames DEI program ‘DOI’ following political backlash
items.description: JPMorgan Chase is changing the name of its diversity, equity, and inclusion program at a time when DEI has been attacked by President Trump’s administ...

items.title: Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett was reportedly paid $2 million for her new book coming this year, including a $425,000 advance
items.description: Barrett, 53, is the youngest member of the Supreme Court.

items.title: Musk tells Tesla employees hang on to stock after 50% plunge
items.description: Elon Musk sought to reassure Tesla employees after the carmaker’s shares plunged more than 50% in just three months.

items.title: DOGE’s plans for social security are back door way to cut payments, experts and former official warn: ‘This is the most serious threat I’ve ever seen to it’
items.description: Elon Musk's government efficiency team, DOGE, is taking aim at Social Security, claiming fraud while pushing controversial changes.
